     ```
@@ -150,3 +137,17 @@ An operation can be triggered using a `POST` request with an empty body. It is a
     ```
 
 The response of the operation is the current status of the partitions. It is sent after the operation is triggered. It doesn't wait until the operation is performed.
+
+## Experimental: Detect Reprocessing Inconsistency
+
+With Zeebe 0.24.5 and 0.25.1 a new exterimental feature was introduced which detects inconsistency of the logstream on upgrade to mitigate the following
+[issue](https://github.com/zeebe-io/zeebe/issues/5581).
+
+We recommend to enable it after upgrading to a new version of Zeebe for the first run after the upgrade as described in the [update proceedure](#upgrade-procedure-for-zeebe-before-0244).
+You can enable it using the following environment variable:
+
+```
+ZEEBE_BROKER_EXPERIMENTAL_DETECTREPROCESSINGINCONSISTENCY="true"
+```
+
+After you [verified that the upgrade](#verifying-the-upgrade) was successfull, we recommend to disable it again by unsetting the environment variable.
